name: Grintale

ability.name: Plump Body
ability.description: Can be ridden. Enhances Neutral attacks while mounted.

description:
Grintale's eyes light up the moment anyone enters its territory.
This is no figure of speech-its eyes literally light up.

skills.name: Sand Blast
skills.description: Hurls sticky mud at an enemy.

skills.name: Power Shot
skills.description: Charges energy into a focused blast.

skills.name: Cat Press
skills.description: Grintale's exclusive skill. Grins menacingly before leaping into the air and smashing foes with its body.

skills.name: Stone Blast
skills.description: Fires a barrage of stones forward.

skills.name: Stone Cannon
skills.description: Digs up a boulder and hurls it at an enemy.

skills.name: Power Bomb
skills.description: Charges a massive amount of energy before firing a large destructive ball.

skills.name: Pal Blast
skills.description: Charges destructive energy before firing a high-powered beam forward across a wide area.
